LanguageData.BadLoadOrder: A bad load order has been detected.\n\nCommunity Core Library is not the second mod loaded. Select 'Restart Now' from this menu to correct this issue and restart RimWorld.
LanguageData.WarnAboutRestart:
A major change has been made to the games data set, such as the loaded mods or the language.

Any major change requires RimWorld to be restarted.

Playing the game without restarting can cause any number of problems from small errors to aliens invading Earth.
LanguageData.ReallyWarnAboutRestart: You really like playing with fire.\n\nYou should stop now while you're behind.
LanguageData.WarnAboutRestartDebug: You should restart the game after making any major to the games data set.\n\nAs a modder you already know this, right?
